title: SCâ€™s new judicial year to begin on Sep 8
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 04 (APP):The new judicial year of the Supreme Court 2025-26 will begin on September 8.
According to the Registrar Supreme Court, the inaugural conference of the new judicial year will be held on September 8 at 9:30 am. The conference will review the progress of judicial reforms.
The statement said that the Chief Justice of Pakistan will highlight the new judicial priorities, and the One-Stop Public Facilitation Center will be inaugurated after the conference.
